get.description: Get a list of jobs in a project. Jobs are sorted in descending order of their IDs.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Scope of jobs to show. Either one of or an array of the following: created, pending, running, failed, success, canceled, skipped, or manual. All jobs are returned if scope is not provided.

get.description: Get a list of jobs for a pipeline.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: pipeline_id
parameters.description: ID of a pipeline. Can also be obtained in CI jobs via the predefined CI variable CI_PIPELINE_ID.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Scope of jobs to show. Either one of or an array of the following: created, pending, running, failed, success, canceled, skipped, or manual. All jobs are returned if scope is not provided.

parameters.name: include_retried
parameters.description: Include retried jobs in the response. Defaults to false. Introduced in GitLab 13.9.

get.description: Get a list of bridge jobs for a pipeline.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: pipeline_id
parameters.description: ID of a pipeline.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Scope of jobs to show. Either one of or an array of the following: created, pending, running, failed, success, canceled, skipped, or manual. All jobs are returned if scope is not provided.

get.description: Retrieve the job that generated a job token.
Retrieve the job that generated the CI_JOB_TOKEN, along with a list of allowed agents.

parameters.name: CI_JOB_TOKEN
parameters.description: Token value associated with the GitLab-provided CI_JOB_TOKEN variable.

get.description: Get a single job of a project

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: ID of a job.

get.description: Get a log (trace) of a specific job of a project:

post.description: Cancel a single job of a project

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: ID of a job.

post.description: Retry a single job of a project

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: ID of a job.

post.description: Erase a single job of a project (remove job artifacts and a job log)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: ID of a job.

post.description: Triggers a manual action to start a job.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: ID of a job.

parameters.name: job_variables_attributes
parameters.description: An array containing the custom variables available to the job. Introduced in GitLab 14.9.
